name: Dipplin
description: The Candy Apple Pokémon. Dipplin is two creatures in one Pokémon. Its evolution was triggered by a special apple grown only in one place.

abilities.name: Supersweet Syrup
abilities.description: Attack rolls made against creatures within 30ft of this Pokémon gain 1d4 on the roll. Creatures with no sense of smell are not affected by this ability.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.
